yingyinNormal.en: They're training dogs to operate the centrifuge for when they need dogs to operate the centrifuge for blind scientists. I have to go.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们在训练狗操作离心机，以备他们需要狗去为盲人科学家操作离心机，我要挂了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a pattern. Your husband's administration, Mrs. Underwood, continues to operate in the shadows.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是个规律。你丈夫的政府，安德伍德夫人，继续在暗箱操作。

yingyinNormal.en: When handling the ricin strip, operate with extreme caution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在使用蓖麻毒的时候要十分小心。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait a second! If he's in his EVA suit, How's he going to operate the controls?
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，如果他穿着宇航服，谁控制飞行器呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Alec. Hey. His dumb dad got transferred to dumb Africa to operate on some dumb babies.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾丽克！他的二货爸爸被调去非洲给一些二货孩子看病。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, what do you think it means. The Syndicate is real. They know who we're, how we operate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好，你觉得那意味着什么？辛迪加是真实存在的，他们知道我们的真实身份，我们如何执行任务。

yingyinNormal.en: We're both businessmen that operate from our gut. And my gut tells me to give you this opportunity.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们都有天生的做生意的直觉，而且我的直觉告诉我，我应该给你这个机会。

yingyinNormal.en: He will not know how to operate it! It is very complicated. Heavy on one end, light on the other. Shush!
yingyinNormal.zh: 他不会知道怎么控制这个的！很复杂的，一头重，一头轻。安静！

yingyinNormal.en: But I will not be able to move forward without the Board's permission to operate under complete autonomy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是如果董事会不能授予我完全的自主权，我将无法继续前进

yingyinNormal.en: Absolutely. But it is an open convention, and so we have to operate with the belief that anything could happen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是当然，但这次是开放党代会，所以我们必须准备应对一切可能发生的情况。

yingyinNormal.en: Can't they operate? Well, I'm sure they'll try, but don't let this flattering hospital lighting fool you, Rebecca, I'm old.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不能手术吗？我相信他们会尽力的，不过别被医院灯光的美化效果骗了，丽贝卡，我老了。

yingyinNormal.en: It's time to return to a simpler age. One where the powers of freedom can once again operate openly to protect their interests.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是时候回归更简单的时代了，一个可以用自由力量光明正大保护自身权益的时代。

yingyinNormal.en: It states, that the Avengers shall no longer be a private organization. Instead, they'll operate under the supervision of a United Nations Panel, only when and if that Panel deems it necessary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 其中写明：复仇者联盟不再是私人组织，而是要在一个联合国小组的监督下行动，且是否出动要由该小组决定。

yingyinNormal.en: The Portobello Road Markets in Notting Hill attract thousands of visitors, especially to the antiques markets that's held on Saturdays, while the edgier Camden Town features six popular markets that are open every day of the week, and operate along her streets, the canal, and in her historic stables.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在诺丁山的波多贝罗路市集吸引着数千名游客，尤其是星期六开放的古董市场最为热闹，而前卫的肯顿城则设有六个市集，市集每天开放。在街道旁的运河则年年月月见证着市场的买卖。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Even when strikes occur, services can continue to <highlight>operate</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使发生罢工，业务也可以继续运作。

examination_example.sentence: Srini Pillay believes this counterintuitive link between downtime and productivity may be due to the way our brains <highlight>operate</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯里尼•皮莱认为，停机时间和生产率之间这种违反直觉的联系可能与我们大脑的运作方式有关。

examination_example.sentence: It gives a basis for planning to meet the possibilities of what could be a very different <highlight>operating</highlight> environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它为规划提供了一个基础，以应对可能非常不同的操作环境的可能性。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person or organization) manage and run a business

examination_example.sentence: Both the wildlife park and zoo claimed to be <highlight>operating</highlight> for the benefit of the animals and for conservation purposes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 野生动物公园和动物园都声称他们是出于动物的利益和保护目的而运营。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Operate</highlight> more globalized companies
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经营更加全球化的公司

examination_example.sentence: As a condition of receiving state approval for the sale, the company agreed to seek permission from state regulators to <highlight>operate</highlight> past 2012.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为获得州政府批准出售的一个条件，该公司同意寻求州政府监管机构的许可，以便在2012年以后运营。

sense_info_list.en: perform a function; be in effect

word_usage.usage:
operate表示“经营”、“管理”，既可作及物动词，也可作不及物动词。例：
Many foreign companies operate factories in the United States.
许多外国公司在美国经营工厂。
They plan to operate from a new office in Shanghai.
他们计划上海的新办事处经营。

operate表示“动手术”时，为不及物动词，其后可跟介词on，表示“对...动手术”。例：
We will have to operate on his eyes.
我们得给他的眼睛动手术。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person) control the functioning of a machine, process, or system; (of a machine, process, or system) function in a specified manner

examination_example.sentence: The study by Greenpeace found they were increasingly <highlight>operating</highlight> in the immediate vicinity of penguin colonies and whale feeding grounds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绿色和平组织 (Greenpeace) 发现他们越来越多地在企鹅聚居地和鲸鱼觅食地附近作业。

examination_example.sentence: Commercial growing fields are astronomically huge and take thousands of man-hours to <highlight>operate</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 商业发展领域好比是天文数字，需要大量的时间去运作。

examination_example.sentence: System institutions are <highlight>operating</highlight> very efficiently based on this analysis, raising the question of the value of pursuing a broad scale outsourcing initiative.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 基于这一分析，董事系统机构运作得非常有效率，这引发了推行大规模外包计划的价值问题。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person or organization) manage and run a business

examination_example.sentence: Last week, one <highlight>operated</highlight> by the taxi company Uber struck and killed a woman pushing her bicycle across a wide road in Arizona.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 上周，Uber出租车公司运营的一辆出租车在亚利桑那州撞死了一名推着自行车穿过宽阔马路的妇女。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: When IT is <highlight>operating</highlight> as it should, employee self-confidence swells.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当信息技术正常运行时，员工的自信心会倍增。

examination_example.sentence: Forgetting how to <highlight>operate</highlight> a familiar object like a microwave oven can also be signs of something going wrong.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 忘记了如何操作微波炉之类的熟悉的物体也可能是出问题的迹象。

sense_info_list.en: (of a person or organization) manage and run a business

examination_example.sentence: New York-based Jump Bikes is already <highlight>operating</highlight> an electric bikeshare in Washington, D. C. , and is launching in San Francisco Thursday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 总部位于纽约的Jump Bikes已经在华盛顿特区运营电动自行车共享服务，并将于周四在旧金山推出。

examination_example.sentence: The UK's Paul Curtis, better known as Moose, <highlight>operates</highlight> around Leeds and London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 英国的保罗·柯蒂斯，更广为人知的名字是穆斯，在利兹和伦敦经营。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 操作; 控制; 使运行

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Compared with gasoline cars, electric cars are more energy-saving, making them cheaper to <highlight>operate</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与汽油车相比，电动汽车更节能，操作成本更低。

examination_example.sentence: Electric vehicles are energy efficient, also making them cheaper to <highlight>operate</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电动汽车是节能的，也使其运行成本更低。

examination_example.sentence: While museums need a huge amount of money to <highlight>operate</highlight>, let the wealthy pay for it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然博物馆需要巨额资金来运营，但还是让富人来买单吧。

sense_info_list.zh: 操作; 控制; 使运行

examination_example.sentence: Then she got to work building something that could help solve the problem; a remote-<highlight>operated</highlight> vehicle, or ROV.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，她开始着手建造一些可以帮助解决问题的东西；遥控器遥控操作的车辆，或ROV。

examination_example.sentence: What's more, computers can do important jobs like <highlight>operating</highlight> railways and flying planes and spaceships.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 更重要的是，计算机可以做重要的工作，比如操作铁路、飞行飞机和宇宙飞船。

examination_example.sentence: I have no idea how I can <highlight>operate</highlight> the new washing machine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我不知道如何操作这台新洗衣机。

examination_example.sentence: During Dr Mar's last visit, he <highlight>operated</highlight> on 150 patients on the ORBIS plane.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在马博士最后一次访问期间，他在ORBIS飞机上为150名患者做了手术。

examination_example.sentence: Dr. Jeff Livingston <highlight>operates</highlight> a medical center for women in Irving, Texas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 杰夫·利文斯顿博士在德克萨斯州欧文市经营一家女性医疗中心。
